description: * Lab Values helps you in accessing the quick information to the common laboratory values.     * You can get the information about a particular lab anywhere & anytime.     * This is like a perfect partner for all medical students, nurses & all other staff in a hospital.     * Around 150 common laboratory values are compiled in this application.     * You have an option of adding a new category, new lab value or edit any lab value     * This application basically displays all the normal laboratory values to help all the medical professionals or the trainees in the interpretation of the results after any test.     * The reference values are shown in SI & US units.     * You have an option of even adding any lab value as your favorites.     * This favorites will help you in searching easily.     * So, this application includes search field to find the values very quickly.     * This application gives you the information of the most common clinical laboratory tests.     * Even patients who are much interested in finding out the normal values can use this application along with the medical professionals.   FEATURES       * Access quick information to the most common laboratory values     * Ideal for medical professionals & other staff     * Add your custom category & add lab values in it     * Favorites can be added     * As many as 200 common lab values in one application     * Easier search available for faster access     * Easily accessible with content which is medically relevant     * The categories which are already there are:                 + Arterial Blood Gases                 + Cerebrospinal fluid                 + Chemistries                 + Endocrinology                 + Hematology                 + Iron studies                 + Lipid panels                 + Medications                 + Thyroid                 + Urine     * Description also given along with the normal values
